TopicTitle: Please put a patch out for loading saves in 64 bit

Articles.Content: Please fix the 64 bit loading a save bug. I have to reinstall KSP every time I want to load a save in 64 bit Please fix!

When I try to load a save in 64 bit, it causes a memory error and crashes. If I uninstall and reinstall it goes away until I exit and try to load up the save again, and thn I have to reinstall again. I checked file integrity, it' all fine there.
Did you try to report that problem you were having first and try to see if anyone can help you?
